title: Calibration-Aware Prompt Learning for Medical Vision-Language Models
summary: This paper introduces CalibPrompt, the first framework to calibrate Medical Vision-Language Models (Med-VLMs) during prompt tuning. It addresses the challenge of miscalibrated predictions in Med-VLMs, which can lead to overconfident errors and undermine clinical trust.
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses "confidence calibration" and "prompt learning" for medical vision-language models. While not explicitly "contextual dataset", prompt learning often involves providing contextual information to guide the model. This makes it tangentially relevant to "Contextual dataset".
